title: Readout of President Donald J. Trump’s Call with President Emmanuel Macron of France – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
January 7, 2018
President Donald J. Trump spoke yesterday with President Emmanuel Macron of France to provide an update on developments on the Korean Peninsula, and to underscore American, South Korean, and international resolve to achieve the complete denuclearization of North Korea.  The Presidents also agreed that the widespread demonstrations in Iran were a sign of the Iranian regime’s failure to serve its people’s needs by instead diverting the nation’s wealth to fund terrorism and militancy abroad.
